ygData.subject: Re: I would like to invite people to live chat ...
ygData.msgSnippet: Please post the server address and what times you expect to be chatting... Slyde of Xegony ... From: JR McConnell  To: EverQuest Bards Mailing
ygData.messageBody:
Please post the server address and what times you expect to be chatting...

Slyde of Xegony
----- Original Message -----
From: JR McConnell <jr@...>
To: EverQuest Bards Mailing list <eqbards@onelist.com>
Sent: Monday, May 10, 1999 2:43 AM
Subject: [eqbards] I would like to invite people to live chat ...


> From: "JR McConnell" <jr@...>
>
> On the IRC network of StarChat, I have created a channel for the live
> gathering of bards of the realms. The channel name is: EverQuestBards. It
is
> just a tavern gathering. for the goal of good talk and friendship. A place
> to share with others and enjoy the company of other bards.
>
> I hope to have a drink with you all, and share a story or two...
>
>
> ------------------------------------------------------------------------
> To unsubscribe from this mailing list, or to change your subscription
> to digest, go to the ONElist web site, at http://www.onelist.com and
> select the Member Center link from the menu bar on the left.
>
